item.title: Mentioned by Orléans Star (blog)
item.description:
Are Conservative MPs ' trained seals?'
Conservative MP Deepak Obhrai, issued a public statement today saying he's not a "trained seal" told what to say by the prime minister's office, no matter what other MPs may say. Obhrai read his statement from a prepared script. A day earlier, MP Brent ...
